page.title: 13RAEBURN PRIMARY
page.content: Coopers pig farm is in Morland Avenue and three of their children go to our school,which is just across the road from the farm.Mrs. Cooper gave us some strawberry milk shake made from goats milk. It had a strong taste. Mr Coopers pig farm has been in the family for forty years. On the farm Mr cooper keeps a thousand pigs.They were mainly pink pigs but he also had a few saddlebacks. Mr Cooper feeds the pigs by using big pipes that automatically fill with food.Then the food travels down the pipes and fills the troughs.The pigs squeal at feeding time and Mr Cooper whistles to them to keep them quiet. Most of the pork goes to Walls Meat Company.The farm has regular inspections to check that the pigs are healthy.
